verses.plain: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour, and Lord Jesus Christ, which is our hope;

tokens.t: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour, and Lord Jesus Christ,
our hope;

verses.plain: Unto Timothy, my own son in the faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord.

tokens.t: Unto Timothy,
own son in the faith: Grace, mercy,
peace, from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord.

verses.plain: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus, when I went into Macedonia, that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine,

tokens.t: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus, when I went into Macedonia, that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine,

verses.plain: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies, which minister questions, rather than godly edifying which is in faith: so do.

tokens.t: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies, which minister questions, rather than godly edifying which is in faith:

verses.plain: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart, and of a good conscience, and of faith unfeigned:

tokens.t: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart, and
a good conscience, and
faith unfeigned:

verses.plain: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling;

tokens.t: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling;

verses.plain: Desiring to be teachers of the law; understanding neither what they say, nor whereof they affirm.

tokens.t: Desiring to be teachers of the law; understanding neither what they say, nor whereof they affirm.

verses.plain: But we know that the law is good, if a man use it lawfully;

tokens.t: But we know that the law
good, if a man use it lawfully;

verses.plain: Knowing this, that the law is not made for a righteous man, but for the lawless and disobedient, for the ungodly and for sinners, for unholy and profane, for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers, for manslayers,

tokens.t: Knowing this, that the law is not made for a righteous man, but for the lawless and disobedient, for the ungodly and for sinners, for unholy and profane, for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers, for manslayers,

verses.plain: For whoremongers, for them that defile themselves with mankind, for menstealers, for liars, for perjured persons, and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine;

tokens.t: For whoremongers, for them that defile themselves with mankind, for menstealers, for liars, for perjured persons, and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine;

verses.plain: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God, which was committed to my trust.

tokens.t: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God, which was committed to my trust.

verses.plain: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord, who hath enabled me, for that he counted me faithful, putting me into the ministry;

tokens.t: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord, who hath enabled me, for that he counted me faithful, putting me into the ministry;

verses.plain: Who was before a blasphemer, and a persecutor, and injurious: but I obtained mercy, because I did it ignorantly in unbelief.

tokens.t: Who was before a blasphemer, and a persecutor, and injurious: but I obtained mercy, because I did
ignorantly in unbelief.

verses.plain: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.

tokens.t: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.

verses.plain: This is a faithful saying, and worthy of all acceptation, that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners; of whom I am chief.

tokens.t: This
a faithful saying, and worthy of all acceptation, that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners; of whom I am chief.

verses.plain: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy, that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering, for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting.

tokens.t: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy, that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering, for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting.

verses.plain: Now unto the King eternal, immortal, invisible, the only wise God, be honour and glory for ever and ever. Amen.

tokens.t: Now unto the King eternal, immortal, invisible, the only wise God,
honour and glory for ever and ever. Amen.

verses.plain: This charge I commit unto thee, son Timothy, according to the prophecies which went before on thee, that thou by them mightest war a good warfare;

tokens.t: This charge I commit unto thee, son Timothy, according to the prophecies which went before on thee, that thou by them mightest war a good warfare;

verses.plain: Holding faith, and a good conscience; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck:

tokens.t: Holding faith, and a good conscience; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck:

verses.plain: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander; whom I have delivered unto Satan, that they may learn not to blaspheme.

tokens.t: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander; whom I have delivered unto Satan, that they may learn not to blaspheme.
